WorkItem.Description: I'm wondering if it'd be possible to refresh a single view in WPP instead of reloading everything with the Connect/Reload button, so that it'd be quicker to see changes to tasks that are being worked on. (sometimes using both), and so that after a "refresh", you end up in the same view you were in before you pressed the "refresh" button, instead of at the top level like what happens now with the Connect/Reload button.
WorkItem.Summary: Can we add a Refresh View button, like in WSUS console

Comments.Message: Added a button to refresh the display of computers status.
